text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Provider organization" means an organization that:
Includes independent home care providers; and
Has as one of its purposes the representation of independent home care providers in their relations with the State.
"Provider organization" does not include an agency or business that employs employees or refers independent contractors as home care providers.
